languages.text: В изобилии, которое Вольный Торговец излил на простонародье планеты, культ смерти угас и уступил место более оптимистичным и миролюбивым учениям.
With all the extravagance bestowed on the planet's commoners by Rogue Trader, the death cult dissolved, giving way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.
languages.original_text: В изобилии, которое Вольный Торговец излил на простонародье планеты, культ смерти угас и уступил место более оптимистичным и миролюбивым учениям.

traits.locale_text: In all the exuberance the Rogue Trader bestowed on the planet's commoners, the death cult expired and gave way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.
In all the exuberance the Rogue Trader bestowed on the planet's commoners, the death cult expired and gave way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.
With all the extravagance bestowed on the planet's commoners by Rogue Trader, the death cult dissolved, giving way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.
With all the extravagance bestowed on the planet's commoners by Rogue Trader, the death cult dissolved, giving way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.
With all the extravagance bestowed on the planet's commoners by Rogue Trader, the death cult dissolved, giving way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.

languages.text: La extravagancia con la que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente trata a la plebe del planeta lleva a la disolución del Culto de la Muerte, dando lugar a enseñanzas más pacíficas y optimistas.
languages.original_text: With all the extravagance bestowed on the planet's commoners by Rogue Trader, the death cult dissolved, giving way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.

traits.locale_text: La extravagancia con la que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente trata a la plebe del planeta lleva a la disolución del Culto de la Muerte, dando lugar a enseñanzas más pacíficas y optimistas.

languages.text: Voyant que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} permettait au petit peuple d'assouvir ses penchants les plus inavouables, le culte de la mort n'a eu d'autre choix que de se dissoudre de lui-même, laissant alors le champ libre à des aspirations plus optimistes et pacifiques.
languages.original_text: With all the extravagance bestowed on the planet's commoners by Rogue Trader, the death cult dissolved, giving way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.

traits.locale_text: Voyant que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} permettait au petit peuple d'assouvir ses penchants les plus inavouables, le culte de la mort n'a eu d'autre choix que de se dissoudre de lui-même, laissant alors le champ libre à des aspirations plus optimistes et pacifiques.

languages.text: 行商浪人让行星居民纵情于世俗的享乐，死亡教派很快分崩离析，让位于更乐观、更平和的教义。
languages.original_text: With all the extravagance bestowed on the planet's commoners by Rogue Trader, the death cult dissolved, giving way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人让行星居民纵情于世俗的享乐，死亡教派很快分崩离析，让位于更乐观、更平和的教义。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーがこの惑星の庶民に贅を尽くした施しを与えたことにより、死のカルトは解散し、より楽観的で平和的な教えへと変わっていった。
languages.original_text: With all the extravagance bestowed on the planet's commoners by Rogue Trader, the death cult dissolved, giving way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーがこの惑星の庶民に贅を尽くした施しを与えたことにより、死のカルトは解散し、より楽観的で平和的な教えへと変わっていった。

languages.text: Angesichts all der Extravaganz, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dem einfachen Volk des Planeten gönnt, hat der Todeskult sich aufgelöst und ist optimistischeren und friedlicheren Lehren gewichen.
languages.original_text: With all the extravagance bestowed on the planet's commoners by Rogue Trader, the death cult dissolved, giving way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.

traits.locale_text: Angesichts all der Extravaganz, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dem einfachen Volk des Planeten gönnt, hat der Todeskult sich aufgelöst und ist optimistischeren und friedlicheren Lehren gewichen.

languages.text: Gezegen sakinlerinin her türlü fuzuli talebini karşılayan Hür Tacir, bu vesileyle ölüm tarikatını ortadan kaldırdı. Artık halka daha iyimser ve barışçıl öğretiler aktarılabilecektir.
languages.original_text: With all the extravagance bestowed on the planet's commoners by Rogue Trader, the death cult dissolved, giving way to more optimistic and peaceful teachings.
